body: These scarred and worn armbands have clearly seen rough use, and are constructed out of coarse leather and fastened with thick leather straps. They grant their wearer a +1 competence bonus on grapple checks and checks to break a grapple.
name: Armbands of the Brawler
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Armbands of the Brawler
